resources.string: 1. Open settings and grant %1$s the overlay permission. This is for displaying an overlay over other apps.
2. Grant %1$s the notification permission (optional). Tapping on the notification will close the overlay and return you to this app.
3. On the starting page, tap on the "%1$s" button.
4. Ensure that "Single App" is selected, then click start. Be wary of the "Entire Screen" option, as this will also capture the overlay.
5. Select the application you want to mirror. This will launch the application, create the overlay, and notification.
6. To exit, tap on the red cross icon in the top-right corner of the overlay. Alternatively, you can pull down on your address bar and tap the notification.

1. You won\'t be able to interact with the application while the overlay is active. Thus, it is recommended that you set up the application beforehand (e.g. starting the navigation in Google Maps) prior to creating the mirror overlay.
2. There will be padding between the application and the overlay. This padding is outside the control of %1$s.
